segments.text: The results of the poll show Bill Clinton's approval rating has gone up in his second term . Do you find that interesting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think Clinton deserves high marks for doing his job generally , but he may get low marks for his honesty and personal image .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is exactly what the poll shows . Although the stating of Clinton as a person has gone down in the last two years of his term , his approval rating is as high as 66 percent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't find this surprising . The poll data sound quite right . He is a good president .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the poll says only 15 percent say he will be remembered as an outstanding president .
segments.speaker: S1
